markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stone Bullet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2928)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [sling bullet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=442)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This sling bullet looks like a petrified serpent's eye. A creature hit by an activated stone bullet is subject to the effects of a 6th-rank [_petrify_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1628) spell (DC 34).

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of [_petrify_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1628).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Stone Bullet
